title: Man Injured In Accidental Shooting
content:
SCOTT COUNTY, Ky. (LEX 18) - A man is recovering following an accidental shooting in Scott County overnight.
It happened on the grounds of Toyota in Georgetown.
Police say a man was sitting inside of a car while showing a gun to a co-worker just before 1 a.m.
Moments later, the gun accidentally discharged hitting the man in the upper thigh.
He is expected to recover from his injuries.
